description: The Lenz Body heat system warms the body from head to toe. The lithium pack rcB 1800 can be used for all models of the Lenz Heat Socks, Heat Vest, Heat Gloves and Heat Pants.<br><br>The lithium packs are connected with snaps. The lithium packs are small, light and provide heat for up to 20 hours at the touch of a button at work, sport and leisure.<br><br>This increases performance and concentration even in cold temperatures and blood circulation is guaranteed.<br><br>The lithium packs rcB 1800 can be controlled directly on the lithium pack. With the Lenz heat app, the heat can also be infinitely regulated using a smartphone. Ideal if the lithium packs are under several layers of clothing.
name: Lithium Battery Pack RCB 1800
